CREATEQUERY.COLUMNDATA: ( STD_TERMID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, STD_TERM VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(STD_TERMID) )
( STT_CHILD_TERMID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, STT_PARENT_TERMID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, STT_ISPARENT CHAR(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(STT_CHILD_TERMID, STT_PARENT_TERMID) )

( EGE_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGE_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGE_SYMBOL VARCHAR(30), EGE_GENE_NAME VARCHAR(100), EGE_SUMMARY TEXT(4000), EGE_CHROMOSOME_MAP VARCHAR(30), EGE_CHROMOSOME VARCHAR(30), PRIMARY KEY (EGE_GENEID) )
( EUG_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EUG_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EUG_UGID VARCHAR(23), PRIMARY KEY (EUG_GENEID,EUG_UGID) )
( EMA_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EMA_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EMA_MAPID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EMA_GENEID, EMA_MAPID) )
( EST_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EST_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12), EST_STSID INTEGER(10), PRIMARY KEY (EST_GENEID, EST_STSID) )
( EGO_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGO_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGO_GOID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EGO_GENEID, EGO_GOID) )
( EOM_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EOM_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EOM_OMIM INTEGER(8), PRIMARY KEY (EOM_GENEID, EOM_OMIM) )
( EPI_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EPI_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EPI_PUBMEDID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EPI_GENEID, EPI_PUBMEDID) )
( EGE_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGE_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EGE_GENE_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EGE_GENEID, EGE_GENE_NAME) )
( EFY_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EFY_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EFY_FLYID VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EFY_GENEID, EFY_FLYID) )
( EPH_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EPH_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, EPH_PHENOTYPE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EPH_GENEID, EPH_PHENOTYPE) )
( GHI_RETIRED_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, GHI_NEW_GENEID INTEGER(12) )

( UGE_UGID VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL, UGE_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, UGE_TITLE VARCHAR(500), UGE_GENE VARCHAR(20), UGE_CYTOBAND VARCHAR(20), UGE_GENEID INTEGER(12), UGE_CHROMOSOME VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (UGE_UGID) )
( UEX_UGID VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL, UEX_TISSUEID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (UEX_UGID, UEX_TISSUEID) )
( USE_UGID VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL, USE_ACC_NO VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, USE_NID VARCHAR(30), USE_PID VARCHAR(30), PRIMARY KEY (USE_UGID, USE_ACC_NO) )
( UPR_UGID VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL, UPR_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12), UPR_PROTGI VARCHAR(30), UPR_PROTID VARCHAR(30) )
( UGH_CURRENTUGID VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL, UGH_PREVUGID VARCHAR(30), UGH_ACC_N0 VARCHAR(30) )
( UST_STSID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, UST_NAME VARCHAR(30), UST_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (UST_STSID,UST_LOCAL_TAXID) )
( UST_STSID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, UST_LOCAL_TAXID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, UST_ACC_NO VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (UST_STSID,UST_LOCAL_TAXID, UST_ACC_NO) )
( USA_STSID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, USA_ALIAS VARCHAR(30) )

( HGE_HOMOLOGENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, HGE_GENEID1 INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, HGE_LOCAL_TAXID1 INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, HGE_GENEID2 INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, HGE_LOCAL_TAXID2 INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, HGE_ALIGNMENT FLOAT(6, 2) NOT NULL, HGE_RECIPROCAL CHARACTER(1) NOT NULL )
( OTH_ORTHOLOGID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, OTH_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL )
( OSL_ORTHOLOGID INTEGER(10) NOT NULL, OSL_GENEID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, OSL_TRUEORTHOLOG CHAR(1) NOT NULL )

( SNP_SNPID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, SNP_LOCALTAXID INTEGER(12) NOt NULL, SNP_CLASS VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, SNP_SNPTYPE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, SNP_OBSERVED VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, SNP_SEQ_5 VARCHAR(4000) NOT NULL, SNP_SEQ_3 VARCHAR(4000) NOT NULL, SNP_MOLTYPE VARCHAR(50), SNP_HETTYPE VARCHAR(100), SNP_HET INTEGER(18), SNP_HET_SE INTEGER(18), PRIMARY KEY ( SNP_SNPID ) )

( CTI_SNPID INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, CTI_CONTIGID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CTI_COMPONENTTYPE VARCHAR(50), CTI_ACCESSION VARCHAR(50), CTI_NAME VARCHAR(50), CTI_CHROMOSOME CHAR(2), CTI_START INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, CTI_END INTEGER(12) NOT NULL, CTI_ORIENT VARCHAR(10), CTI_GI INTEGER(12), PRIMARY KEY (CTI_SNPID,CTI_CONTIGID) )
